data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: What are the benefits of using ComfyUI Pets?
data.answer: Increased mental health, guaranteed 500% boost in productivity, and improved image generation speed by 0.0001 it/s.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: How can I earn coins by using ComfyUI Pets?
data.answer: With each image you generate, you'll also earn valuable coins.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: What can I do with the coins earned?
data.answer: Spend coins in the shop to feed and improve your pet.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: How can I interact with my pet in ComfyUI Pets?
data.answer: You can shower your furry friend with affectionate head pats and treat them to delicious food.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: What types of games can I play with my pet?
data.answer: You can engage in thrilling games with your beloved companion, challenge your pet to beat high scores, conquer obstacles, and embark on thrilling adventures together.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: How do I install ComfyUI Pets?
data.answer: To install ComfyUI Pets, follow these steps: 1. cd custom_nodes 2. git clone https://github.com/nathannlu/comfyui-pets.git 3. In your ComfyUI, right click and select 'Add Node'. Find 'Pets' > 'Comfy Pet'. 4. Enjoy your new buddy.

data.subject: ComfyUI-Pets
data.question: Are there other extensions or plugins related to ComfyUI?
data.answer: Yes, there is a plugin called ComfyUI-Cloud that allows you to run your workflow using cloud GPU resources from your local ComfyUI.
